Class ptx

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptx

  • public class ptx
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the core algorithm for drawing recognition and optical processing.

      • calcA0A1

        public void calcA0A1(vec2f[] _ROI)
        Calculate two parametrs for the geometric correction on the camera picture.
        Parameters:
        _ROI - the 4 points defining the region of interest

      • trapeze

        public void trapeze(PImage _in,
                    PImage _out,
                    int _wBef,
                    int _hBef,
                    int _wAft,
                    int _hAft,
                    vec2f[] _ROI)
        Apply the geometric correction on the camera picture.
        Parameters:
        _in - Origine Image
        _out - Destination Image
        _wBef - width of the origine image
        _hBef - height of the origine image
        _wAft - width of the destination image
        _hAft - height of the destination image
        _ROI - the 4 points defining the region of interest

      • parseImage

        public boolean parseImage(PImage in,
                          PImage outFilter,
                          PImage outRez,
                          int _w,
                          int _h)
        Main function that calls other sub function in order to parse the selected image and get the list of areas.
        Parameters:
        in - Origine image
        outFilter - Filtered image
        outRez - End result image
        _w - width of the image
        _h - height of the image

      • reset

        public void reset(int _w,
                  int _h)
        Reset all information from previous scans, allowing for a fresh new one.
        Parameters:
        _w - width of the image
        _h - height of the image

        public boolean isolateForeground(PImage in,
                                 PImage outFilter,
                                 PImage outRez,
                                 int _w,

        Isolate the color part of the image, mainly based on saturation
        Parameters:
        in - Source Image
        outFilter - Destination Image Filtered
        outRez - Destination Image Result
        _w - width of the image
        _h - height of the image

                   int _h,

        Smoothing the resulting information (blur algo, black & white)
        Parameters:

        _h - height of the image
        outFilter - Image to process

      • extractRegions

        public void extractRegions(int _w,
                           int _h)
        Extract region as group of pixels for each colors. This functions generate the areas that we will then process further.
        Parameters:
        _w - width of the image
        _h - height of the image

        _h - height of the image

        public void detectContour(int _w,

        _h - height of the image
